TopicTitle: Collision boxes showing up in VAB icon

Articles.Content:
So I finally got my hatch and ladder to work beautifully, but I see ugly white bounding boxes in the VAB parts toolbox, but not in the VAB itself... any ideas on how to correct this?

TIA!

Make sure that:

- the mesh renderer is removed

- hatch and ladder have the correct tags and are on part triggers layer

- hatch and ladder colliders have 'is Trigger' checked
